tribe_name: Havasupai Tribe of the Havasupai Reservation, Arizona

awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO HAVASUPAI TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF THE HAVASUPAI TRIBE.  

THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $123,000.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL ATTEND ENVIRONMENTAL CONFERENCES AND TRAININGS, INCLUDING THE EPA ANNUAL CONFERENCE; DEVELOP EDUCATION AND OUTREACH MATERIALS ON COMPOSTING AND CLIMATE CHANGE; DEVELOP AND BEGIN CONDUCTING THE FIRST YEAR OF A TWO YEAR PILOT COMPOSTING PROJECT;  IMPLEMENT THE TRIBE'S SOLID WASTE PROGRAM, THAT INCLUDES THE REMOVAL AND TRANSPORT OF RECYCLABLES AND SOLID WASTE FROM THE CANYON TO THE NEAREST TRANSFER STATION; CONDUCT AN ABANDONED VEHICLE AND WETLANDS SURVEY; AND WILL DEVELOP CAPACITY IN THE TRIBE'S AIR QUALITY PROGRAM BY COLLECTING BASELINE DATA AS PART OF A PILOT STUDY. SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE TRAINING PLANS FOR ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF; SUMMARY REPORTS FOR MEETING, TRAININGS, AND CONFERENCES ATTENDED; EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS DEVELOPED ON RECYCLING AND CLIMATE CHANGE; DATA ON RECYCLABLES AND SOLID WASTE COLLECTED AND TRANSPORTED; AND A QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN FOR COLLECTING AIR QUALITY DATA.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
